attributes.review: Bruh I was using my toilet and all of a sudden this pops up as an ad and then I downloaded it and got an std bruh how am I gonna get that out man all cause of this stupid app man bruh y’all gotta fix it y’all also paying for my std payment when all that gets out!!🤦🏽‍♀️🤬also I looked at some other reviews and man this didn’t only happen to me fix this app before I get something worse than an std!!! attributes.review: this app is absolutely terrible and not helpful at all!! it needs to be deleted!! way too many issues. it took up most of the storage on my phone!!! now i have nowhere to store the pictures of my pet penguin!! how am i going to run his modeling page now?? it’s so rude and also i get so many notifications from this app that i can’t concentrate on my studies. how will i be able to finish my acrobat scholarship?? the app is so cluttered it isn’t possible to focus on anything it is saying! the text is in a font i have never seen before and some of it isn’t even in english?? i don’t even think it’s a language that exists. is it pig latin?? somebody explain. there is no redeeming of this app!! please just delete it!!!
attributes.title: terrible awful app!! plz delete!

attributes.title: Horrible app

attributes.review: BEWARE! I just recently came out of intense medical treatment after developing severe health problems from this app. Almost immediately after downloading the app I began to notice weird changes about my body. My skin discolored to a pale ghostly white and the head began to dis morph into a tall pointed cone shape. I also developed an inclination to only wear white hoods and red hats. Be warned this may happen to you. Other symptoms include nausea, shortness of breath, short temper, lack of taste for justice, ignorance and and a thirst for ruining all things good.
attributes.title: causes cancer

attributes.review: this app kidnapped my 6 pet komodo dragons and held them for a $89 trillion ransom! It also turned all of my shirts inside out on their hangers which isn’t that bad but it’s a real inconvenience 😡 Also, while I was asleep, this app took all of the sheets off of my bed and replaced them with sheets from the show The Big Bang Theory, and I HATE THAT SHOW!! 😾 Do not download, it also gave my phone 863,234 viruses and sent all of my private information and Brain Pop fanfiction to my long lost twin brother! Not cool! 🤮
attributes.title: HORRIBLE!

attributes.review: The Trump 2020 app gave me a virus!!! I downloaded it one night around 2pm in the summer around christmas time. I was in my room, walking home, on my way to work but I got really hungry so I went into the kitchen and started making some sense cause my sister lost her virginity again!! I didn’t know what to do so I downloaded the app in hopes that she could feel closer to our god-honoring president only to find out he’s NEVER read the bible?? I don’t know but after that I got a the Trump Virus.
attributes.title: TRUMP APP GAVE ME A VIRUS?? (GONE WRONG)

attributes.review: To put it frankly, this app stinks on ice. My anxiety and depression that I’ve kept under control by going to weekly therapy for 17 years has absolutely SKYROCKETED since I laid my thumb down on my home button to consent to download this stupid app. It glitches, it freezes, and it drains my battery from 60 to 0 in 3.5 seconds. Really awful design sense too. You’d think with that amount of money he’d be able to hire a web designer with taste. Sad! Save yourself the time and don’t download.
attributes.title: n o  t h a n k s 🧚🏼🌈🥰

attributes.review: I downloaded this app and within the first day of it installing my house just up and left. I had no other choice then to live in the gutter but to my surprise when I deleted this house stealer my house came back. Not only did my house go missing but it also took my dog and my fridge and that was the last straw. I highly recommend not downloading this app as it might steal all y’all’s houses too and your dogs. But most importantly it might steal your fridge.
attributes.title: Stole my house
